<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Staff Sweep](/Feats.aspx?ID=1195) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 75</row>

**Archetype** [Staff Acrobat](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=37)

**Prerequisites**
[Staff Acrobat Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1193)

**Requirements**
You are wielding your staff.

</column>

---

You sweep your foes away with your staff. Roll an Athletics check to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40), and compare the result to the appropriate DCs of up to two foes, each of whom must be within your reach and no more than 5 feet apart.
